name: Get Out (itch) (JeffCube, Scat)
description:
You have a man on the outside. Work together to break out of prison.

A game made by:

JeffCube: Programmer (https://itch.io/profile/jeffcube)

ScatMan: 3D Modeler, Level Designer (https://itch.io/profile/scatmaster)

SHHH: Sound Designer (Pending itch.io handle)
